title: ZeroNet+ Blog
description:
Official blog with updates about the ZeroNet+ app.

ZeroNet Plus is a app to give more features to ZeroNet. It now is in an early stage of development.

post.title: ZeroNet Plus 1.0.1+ is comming
post.body:
The first version (1.0.0.0) isn't launched yet, since I'm figuring out how to make Electrify app work again, to export the project to Electron.

Those are some screenshots about latest ZeroNet Plus:

![post1-1.png (813x611)](data/img/post_1_post1-1.png)![post1-2.png (816x614)](data/img/post_1_post1-2.png)![post1-3.jpg (1090x662)](data/img/post_1_post1-3.jpg)![post1-4.png (813x613)](data/img/post_1_post1-4.png)![post1-5.png (815x615)](data/img/post_1_post1-5.png)![post1-6.png (815x618)](data/img/post_1_post1-6.png)​​​​​​​
